bytebase.store.MFAConfig.schema.strict.j.description: MFAConfig is the MFA configuration for a user.

otp_secret.description: The otp_secret is the secret key used to validate the OTP code.

recovery_codes.description: The recovery_codes are the codes that can be used to recover the account.

temp_otp_secret.description: The temp_otp_secret is the temporary secret key used to validate the OTP code and will replace the otp_secret in two-phase commits.

temp_otp_secret_created_time.description: The temp_otp_secret_created_time is the timestamp when temp_otp_secret was created. Used to enforce expiration.

temp_recovery_codes.description: The temp_recovery_codes are the temporary codes that will replace the recovery_codes in two-phase commits.

bytebase.store.MFAConfig.schema.strict.j.title: MFA Config
